channel.title: Xml for my server
channel.description:
Hi,
I opened MoparScape client and saw that you open items.xml by clicking on item ids in the client. I confirmed that myself by editing the xml thing and it worked :P but how do i open that thing like it opens OUT OF the client. I know that you can open it with a notepad, with excel and with a browser but i want to open it like it opens when i click on item ids :S How do i do it? I want to make it downloadable for my players but i dont want to put it in my client, i just want them to be able to open it so please could you guys tell me what to do that it seems like on moparscape client when i open that xml file?
thanks sale

item.title: Xml for my server
item.dc:creator: @Saletana Saletana
item.description:
@Saletana wrote:

Hi,

I opened MoparScape client and saw that you open items.xml by clicking on item ids in the client. I confirmed that myself by editing the xml thing and it worked but how do i open that thing like it opens OUT OF the client. I know that you can open it with a notepad, with excel and with a browser but i want to open it like it opens when i click on item ids :S How do i do it? I want to make it downloadable for my players but i dont want to put it in my client, i just want them to be able to open it so please could you guys tell me what to do that it seems like on moparscape client when i open that xml file?
